description: Hi! My name is Victor. I am a developer running into freelance way, adventurer and tech-lover.
Since 2020, I have been working for big companies as Merlin Properties or Airbus Defence And Space. I have always held developer positions.
This 2024 is when I've decided to create my own Software Development company: Rolling Release. I've decided to create this company because I really like technology, business and entrepreneurship.
If you are looking for professionalism and dedication, count on me!
